examples.example: 一直往前走，到了路口左拐就可以看见美丽的花园。

translate.english: Go straight ahead, turn left at the intersection and you can see the beautiful garden.

examples.example: 我们沿着街道一直走，到了第一个路口左拐，便来到了热闹的集市。

translate.english: We walked straight along the street, turned left at the first intersection, and then came to the lively market.

examples.example: 每次走到这个熟悉的路口左拐，就能感受到家的温暖气息。

translate.english: Every time walking to this familiar intersection and turning left, one can feel the warm atmosphere of home.
